docs.snippet: Libya's U.N.-backed government has criticized U.S. President Donald Trump's temporary ban on its nationals and those of six other countries entering the United States, which put in question attendance at a high-profile conference on Libya planned ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Libya's U.N.-backed government has criticized U.S. President Donald Trump's temporary ban on its nationals and those of six other countries entering the United States, which put in question attendance at a high-profile conference on Libya planned in Washington for mid-February.

headline.main: Libyan Officials Criticize U.S. Travel Ban, Doubt Over February Conference
headline.print_headline: Libyan Officials Criticize U.S. Travel Ban, Doubt Over February Conference

docs.snippet: The World Olympians Association (WOA) expressed concern on Tuesday about the potential impact U.S. President Donald Trump's travel ban on visitors from some Muslim-majority nations could have on athletes and urged a quick resolution....
docs.lead_paragraph: The World Olympians Association (WOA) expressed concern on Tuesday about the potential impact U.S. President Donald Trump's travel ban on visitors from some Muslim-majority nations could have on athletes and urged a quick resolution.

headline.main: Olympians Urge Speedy Resolution to Trump Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Olympians Urge Speedy Resolution to Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: Massachusetts on Tuesday joined a legal effort to block U.S. President Donald Trump's order banning travel from seven Muslim-majority countries, which the state's attorney general has said is unconstitutional....
docs.lead_paragraph: Massachusetts on Tuesday joined a legal effort to block U.S. President Donald Trump's order banning travel from seven Muslim-majority countries, which the state's attorney general has said is unconstitutional.

headline.main: Massachusetts Joins Court Battle Against Trump Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Joins Court Battle Against Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: Universities across the nation say President Donald Trump's ban on travelers from seven Muslim countries is disrupting vital research projects and academic exchanges in such fields as medicine, public health and engineering, with untold numbers of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Universities across the nation say President Donald Trump's ban on travelers from seven Muslim countries is disrupting vital research projects and academic exchanges in such fields as medicine, public health and engineering, with untold numbers of scholars blocked from entering the U.S.

headline.main: Travel Ban Throws Research, Academic Exchange Into Turmoil
headline.print_headline: Travel Ban Throws Research, Academic Exchange Into Turmoil

docs.snippet: The court’s decision against the Justice Department deepened the legal showdown over President Trump’s immigration order....
docs.lead_paragraph: The court’s decision against the Justice Department deepened the legal showdown over President Trump’s immigration order.

headline.main: Appeals Court Rejects Request to Immediately Restore Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Administration Files an Appeal of Travel Ruling

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Alexander Burns, Russell Goldman, Nicholas Kulish and Somini Sengupta from New York; Adam Liptak, Gardiner Harris, Ron Nixon, Eric Lichtblau and Noah Weiland from Washington; and Thomas Erdbrink from Tehran.

docs.snippet: The chiefs of major banks told employees that the need for national security should be balanced with supporting diversity. Here’s what these executives said in their words....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chiefs of major banks told employees that the need for national security should be balanced with supporting diversity. Here’s what these executives said in their words.

headline.main: Wall Street Reassures Employees, Without Wholly Rejecting Travel Ban

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

docs.snippet: A procedural vote in the Senate on Donald Trump's secretary of state nominee sets up an extended debate over the president's executive order barring refugees for at least four months and the direction of U.S. policy toward Russia....
docs.lead_paragraph: A procedural vote in the Senate on Donald Trump's secretary of state nominee sets up an extended debate over the president's executive order barring refugees for at least four months and the direction of U.S. policy toward Russia.

headline.main: Senate Procedural Vote Sets Up Debate Over Trump Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Senate Procedural Vote Sets Up Debate Over Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: Hundreds of American diplomats defied a White House warning on Tuesday, sending a memo to the State Department's leadership that criticizes President Donald Trump's temporary travel ban on citizens from seven Muslim-majority countries. It is belie...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of American diplomats defied a White House warning on Tuesday, sending a memo to the State Department's leadership that criticizes President Donald Trump's temporary travel ban on citizens from seven Muslim-majority countries. It is believed to be one of the most popularly supported statements of dissent in the department's history.

headline.main: Diplomats Defy White House Warning, Criticize Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Diplomats Defy White House Warning, Criticize Travel Ban

docs.snippet: Seeking to capitalize on U.S. President Donald Trump's controversial new travel restrictions, companies and officials in Asia said they would target greater tourism and education ties with Muslims worried about the curbs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seeking to capitalize on U.S. President Donald Trump's controversial new travel restrictions, companies and officials in Asia said they would target greater tourism and education ties with Muslims worried about the curbs.

headline.main: Asia Targets Tourism, Education Boost From Trump Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Asia Targets Tourism, Education Boost From Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump's decision to suspend the U.S. Refugee Admissions Program for 120 days and institute a 90-day ban on all entry to the United States from citizens of seven predominantly Muslim countries has sent ripples across the globe, pro...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump's decision to suspend the U.S. Refugee Admissions Program for 120 days and institute a 90-day ban on all entry to the United States from citizens of seven predominantly Muslim countries has sent ripples across the globe, provoked a political reaction at home and led to high-stakes legal maneuvering.

headline.main: Trump's Travel Ban Jolts Globe, Leads to Legal Fight
headline.print_headline: Trump's Travel Ban Jolts Globe, Leads to Legal Fight
